General.Name: FuJian YanJing HuiQuan Brewery Co Ltd
General.Description: FuJian YanJing HuiQuan Brewery Co.,Ltd produces and sells beer in China. Its products portfolio includes Hui Quanyimai, Huiquan Chunsheng, Huiquan European Knight, and Huiquan fresh beer series products. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Quanzhou, China. FuJian YanJing HuiQuan Brewery Co.,Ltd is a subsidiary of Beijing Yanjing Brewery Co., Ltd.
General.Address: No. 1999, Huiquan North Road, Quanzhou, China, 362100
